title: London, BL, Add. 14721
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Collection of Hymns
Hymns in which there is a change of tone (ܫܘܚܠܦ ܩ̈ܠܐ)
Simple hymns, without any change of tone (ܩ̈ܠܐ ܫܚ̈ܝ̣ܡܐ ܘܕܩܝ̇ܡܬܐ) and hymns for the Resurrection
Supplications (ܬܟܫ̈ܦܬܐ), arranged according to the eight tones
syrTitle: ܫܠ̣ܡ ܩ̈ܠܐ ܓ̈ܢܝܙܬܐ (sic) ܐܘܿ ܟܝܬ ܪܘܪ̈ܒܐ: ܟܠ ܕܩ̇ܪܐ ܢܨ̇ܠܐ ܥܠ ܟ̇ܬܘܒܐ ܘܥܠ ܟܠ ܕܐܫܬ݀ܘܬܦ ܏ܘܫ
